review: Got it over Christmas for $79 which was $20 off than the regular $99 it sells for but, like the speed, quality of the menus and the overall layout. Very user-friendly interface and remote control with voice controls is great. Great job Jeff! Now only if you could have done the same with the Fire phone ;)
author: Abid Syed "AbidSyedK"

review: Fire TV is great, and we enjoy the beautiful pictures on the stand-by mode.  The voice recognition works great too.  Although we had some tough bugs to work out with the updated Netflix version, Amazon in South Africa did a wonderful and patient job of troubleshooting the problems.  It ended up in an exchange, and the replacement works great!  It's a little difficult to navigate away from Amazon Prime, and the included prime selections pale in comparison to Netflix.  Then again, Amazon Prime is not Netflix, and the Prime offerings load faster than Netflix most of the time.Fire TV certainly outshines the Roku it replaced!
